Hillary Clinton: s claim that Donald Trump said "Let it go" regarding the auto industry during the Great Recession.
Donald Trump: s public comments calling for saving the auto industry and stressing the importance of rescuing the Big Three automakers.
Trump: s inconsistent position on an auto bailout, suggesting that the companies could save themselves through Chapter 11 bankruptcy with government support.
Obama: s decision to force Chrysler and General Motors to go through bankruptcy in mid-2009.
